name: Farm Protector
description: Keeping watch with a rifle from the barn window, you will have to defend the chickens from predators! Be careful!! The key is to save bullets, take care of each shot. You have to resist 4 minutes. This is my first game made with unity, if you want you can comment how many tries it took you to win the game. IMPORTANT !!  to reload you have to use "r". the chickens that are alive can be seen on the top left of the screen and the remaining time is on the top right.  "Low poly mountain lion (Puma concolor)" (https://skfb.ly/otsBt)  by Natural History Museum of Los Angeles County  is licensed under CC Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike  (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4.0/).
